instructions.title: How to use YouTube Timestamp Generator

steps.title: Add your first timestamp
steps.description: Enter a time in MM:SS or HH:MM:SS format (e.g., 01:30 or 1:30:00) and a descriptive label for the chapter. The first chapter at 00:00 is required for YouTube Chapters to work. Click 'Add Timestamp' or press Enter to add it to your list.

steps.title: Build your chapter list
steps.description: Continue adding timestamps for each section of your video. YouTube requires at least 3 chapters with the first starting at 00:00. Chapters must be at least 10 seconds apart. Edit or delete timestamps anytime using the action buttons in each row.

steps.title: Add your video URL (optional)
steps.description: Paste your YouTube video URL to generate clickable timestamp links. The tool supports all YouTube URL formats including youtube.com/watch, youtu.be short links, and embed URLs. Links will include the &t= parameter for direct navigation.

steps.title: Copy and use your chapters
steps.description: Click 'Copy Chapters' to copy the formatted timestamps for your video description. The format is exactly what YouTube expects: timestamp followed by title on each line. If you added a video URL, use 'Copy with Links' for clickable timestamp links.

steps.title: Import existing chapters
steps.description: Have chapters from another source? Click 'Import Chapters' and paste them in the standard format (timestamp space title). The tool will parse and add them to your list automatically. Great for migrating timestamps from other videos or text files.

troubleshooting: Chapters not showing on YouTube: Ensure you have at least 3 chapters, the first starts at 00:00, and chapters are at least 10 seconds apart.
Invalid time error: Use MM:SS (05:30) or HH:MM:SS (1:05:30) format. Pure seconds also work (90).
Video URL not recognized: Make sure it's a valid YouTube URL. The tool supports youtube.com/watch, youtu.be, and embed formats.
Timestamps not in order: The tool automatically sorts timestamps chronologically when generating output.
Import not working: Each chapter should be on its own line with format 'MM:SS Title' or 'HH:MM:SS Title'.
Links not appearing: Add a valid YouTube video URL to enable timestamp link generation.
Chapter titles cut off: YouTube truncates long titles. Keep them under 100 characters.
Copied but not working: Make sure to paste in the video description, not the title or tags field.
